smells.name: ComplexCondition
smells.description: Complex conditions should be simplified and extracted into well-named methods if necessary.

instances.message: This condition is too complex.

smells.name: LongParameterList
smells.description: The more parameters a method has the more complex it is. Long parameter lists are often used to control complex algorithms and violate the Single Responsibility Principle. Prefer methods with short parameter lists.

instances.message: The function radioButtonSelecionado has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function iniciaContagem has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function pegaValorAnteriorAndSoma has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function iniciaPontuacaoTeste has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function logicaDePontuacao has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.
The function verficaSeEstaSelecionado has too many parameters. The current threshold is set to 6.

smells.name: PackageNaming
smells.description: Package names should match the naming convention set in the configuration.

instances.message: Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$
Package name should match the pattern: ^[a-z]+(\.[a-z][a-z0-9]*)*$

smells.name: NewLineAtEndOfFile
smells.description: Checks whether files end with a line separator.

instances.message: The file DisplayAd.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file TelaInicialHelper.kt is not ending with a new line.
The file TelaResultadoHelper.kt is not ending with a new line.

smells.name: MayBeConst
smells.description: Reports vals that can be const val instead.

instances.message: NOME_BANCO_RESULTADO_DAO can be a `const val`.
TABELA_RESULTADO_DAO can be a `const val`.
PLAY_STORE_URL can be a `const val`.

smells.name: SpacingBetweenPackageAndImports
smells.description: Violation of the package declaration style.

instances.message: There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of GenericDAO.
There should be exactly one empty line in between the list of imports and the declaration of Pontuacao.

smells.name: UnusedImports
smells.description: Unused Imports are dead code and should be removed.

instances.message: The import 'android.database.Cursor' is unused.
The import 'android.content.DialogInterface' is unused.
The import 'android.content.DialogInterface' is unused.
Private property id is unused.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

instances.message: This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.
This expression contains a magic number. Consider defining it to a well named constant.

smells.name: ExpressionBodySyntax
smells.description: Functions with exact one statement, the return statement, can be rewritten with ExpressionBodySyntax.
